title: The Human skeleton. Part 2. Muscles, movement and posture
creator_credit: Beryl Denman Lacey, Frank Wells and Gaumont-British Instructional
brief_description: Shows by live-action, animated diagram and radiology, the position, attachment, and function of the muscles relative to the bones and joints; the movements of the arm and of respiration; and the action of the muscles in maintaining posture in the standing and moving positions.
title_for_label: The Human skeleton. Part 2. Muscles, movement and posture
